section.title: Description
section.p: "To allow to be known, issued, done, or exhibited: to release an article for publication." - Dictionary.com. Represents the release of an Order Action such that it is now visible to and actionable by other persons.

stentry.p: The date/time that the Order Action was released for further action by other providers.
Identifies the provider who released the Order Action for further action by other persons.
